prompt: Design a Terms & Conditions screen with a dark theme for a sleek, modern appearance. The app bar should be dark gray with the title 'Terms & Conditions' in a bold, white font, centered. Include a white back arrow icon on the left for navigation. The main content area should be a scrollable section with a dark background, containing the terms text in a light gray font with 1.6 line spacing for readability. Place the text within a card with subtle elevation and rounded corners. At the bottom, include a sticky footer with a 'Decline' button (white border, white text) on the left and an 'Accept' button (blue background, white text) on the right. Use minimal padding for a compact yet clean look, ensuring the design is responsive across devices.
